raw_text: ABEYRATNE – AJITH – Calleld to his eternal abode. Beloved husband of Lohini,​ loving father of Surovi,​ Kishen and Vashni and father-in-law of Chandeep Corea. Cherished grandfather of Mishaal,​ Tameem,​ Tashlisa and Araen,​ son of the late Dr. Ernest and Ranee Abeyratne and much-loved brother of Seneka,​ Visaka and Harsha. Brother-in-Law of the late Dudley and Ajitha and Ingrid. Son-in-Law of the late Ananda and of Rachel Goonesinha,​ Shepered to the congregation of Calvary Church Mirihana passed away on 26th October 23. Remains will lie at AF Raymonds Funeral Parlour from 8.00 a.m. onwards on Sunday,​ 29th October 23. Service on Monday,​ October 30th,​ at 3.00 p.m. at the Parlour. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.30 p.m. for cremation (old crematorium) at Borella Kanatta,​ at 5.00 p.m.069429

DALPADADO – PREETHEE SONALI (nee HERAT) Dearly beloved wife of Srilal. Precious mother of Kusal and Anya. Loved mother-in-law of Danoj Gamage and Darling grandmother of Devin. Beloved daughter of the late Jayatissa and late Marie herat. Sister of late Dr. Uthum and of Saliya and Rosita,​ Sirinath and Nelun and Mihiri and Miran Rambukwella. Cortege leaves A. F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Monday 30th October After funeral service at 1.30 p.m.,​ followed by cremation at the new crematorium at Borella Cemetery at 2.30 p.m.069651
